channel.title: cassandra on Data Foo
channel.description: Recent content in cassandra on Data Foo

item.title: Azure Cosmos DB: Use Cases and Trade-Offs
item.description: Azure Cosmos DB is a fully managed, elastically scalable and globally distributed database with a multi-model approach, and provides you with the ability to use document, key-value, wide-column, or graph-based data.

item.title: Build fault tolerant applications with Cassandra API for Azure Cosmos DB
item.description: Azure Cosmos DB is a resource governed system that allows you to execute a certain number of operations per second based on the provisioned throughput you have configured.
